overview: An introduction to Iosonouncane's new album, "Ira", Caravan is an uncategorizable movie, a film that dives into a specific moment in the long recordings of the album, opening a different space where to look and listen. Footage comes from years of filming around the album recordings, made by Alberto Gottardo, and new shots taken from the upcoming duo's documentary. There's no digital set-up or studio reconstruction, just documentaries' footage.
title: Caravan
